snippet.title: Police investigating Balga death
snippet.content: THE WA Police Homicide Squad is investigating the circumstances of a 36-year-old man in Balga on Friday night. Police say they were called to the house in Darlington Crescent just after 8.30pm where the man was found. He was treated by ambulance officers at the scene but died a short time later. Anyone with any information is asked to call Crime Stoppers on 1800 333 000 or make a report online at .
